name: Missing Critters
description: Embark on a delightful adventure of discovery as you seek out the Missing Critters hidden throughout beautifully intricate cartoon scenes. Let the soothing lo-fi soundtrack transport you to a place of calm focus as you explore each level at your own pace, with no time limits or constraints. Enjoy the thrill of the hunt and the satisfaction of finding all the Critters, all while unwinding and taking a break from the stresses of the day. Get ready for a unique and captivating experience that will keep you coming back for more.
